frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-clip-note
frozen.shortDescription: Save clip contents to multiple notes with separate tags. Notes locate at ~/.local/share/clip-note/. Dots in filename means splited tags.
frozen.longDescription: Save clip contents to multiple notes with separate tags. Notes locate at ~/.local/share/clip-note/. Dots in filename means splited tags.
